title: Pixel4XL won't start. I just got second pixel 4X.I would like to recover my data from the broken
content:
Hi guys, few days ago my pixel 4xl just died while I was having a conversation. 
Same day I bought another PIXEL 4. I would like to know if is possible to recover the picture from the broken phone?
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 4 XL
